pkgmetadata.longdescription: Marginal Modeling for Exposure Data with Values Below the LOD // Functions of marginal mean and quantile regression models are used to analyze environmental exposure and biomonitoring data with repeated measurements and non-detects (i.e., values below the limit of detection (LOD)), as well as longitudinal exposure data that include non-detects and time-dependent covariates. For more details see Chen IC, Bertke SJ, Curwin BD (2021) doi:10.1038/s41370-021-00345-1, Chen IC, Bertke SJ, Estill CF (2024) doi:10.1038/s41370-024-00640-7, Chen IC, Bertke SJ, Dahm MM (2024) doi:10.1093/annweh/wxae068, and Chen IC (2025) doi:10.1038/s41370-025-00752-8.
